Prologue The memories of that day would stay with [me]0-i forever . Even twenty years later , it still felt like it happened yesterday . The vivid pictures in [my]0-i head were like a movie reel that would n’t stop playing , but despite the tragic events that took place that day , [I]0-i lived [my]0-i life in peace . [I]0-i could hear the scrambling of [people]148-people , [fire trucks]149-fire trucks , and sirens . The voices of [the men]150-the men and [their]150-the men footsteps as [they]150-the men walked through the horrific scene that was in front of [them]150-the men echoed in the distance . “ [[My]151-one man god]1298-my god , [I]151-one man ca n’t believe this , ”[151-one man] [one man]151-one man spoke in a horrified voice . [I]0-i opened [my]0-i eyes and began to slowly crawl out from the debris and ruble that engulfed [me]0-i . As [I]0-i stood up , [a man who stood tall]152-a man who stood tall stared at [me]0-i from a distance , [his]152-a man who stood tall face impaled with shock . “ There ’s [a survivor]1299-a survivor ! [A child]1300-a child ! ”[152-a man who stood tall] [he]152-a man who stood tall shouted as [he]152-a man who stood tall made [his]152-a man who stood tall way over to [me]0-i . The pink dress with the white daisies [[my]0-i mom]153-my mom had bought [me]0-i was torn and stained with black . One of [my]0-i white patent leather shoes was missing and blood poured down [my]0-i leg as [I]0-i looked at the open wound . When [the man]154-the man reached [me]0-i , [he]154-the man bent down and grasped [my]0-i shoulders , staring at [me]0-i with teary eyes . “ [You]0-i ’re going to be okay , [sweetheart]1301-sweetheart , ”[154-the man] [he]154-the man spoke as [he]154-the man hugged [me]0-i . [He]154-the man picked [me]0-i up and [I]0-i wrapped [my]0-i legs around [his]154-the man waist and [my]0-i arms around [his]154-the man neck . As [he]154-the man carried [me]0-i from [the site]155-the site , [I]0-i gently smiled as [I]0-i stared at the shadowy figures that were making [their]156-their way back [home]157-home . [They]156-their were at peace and filled with light . [I]0-i wanted to follow [them]156-their , but it was n’t [my]0-i time , and at the tender age of five , [I]0-i fully understood what that meant . [I]0-i remember the sun hitting [my]0-i face as [he]154-the man carried [me]0-i out from the debris and laid [me]0-i down on the stretcher that was waiting for [me]0-i . [People]148-people hovered with shocked expressions on [their]148-people faces as [they]148-people took [my]0-i vitals and scrambled around while tears fell from [their]148-people eyes in disbelief that [I]0-i was alive . [I]0-i was transported to [the hospital]159-the hospital , where [I]0-i was treated by [a tall and handsome young doctor who made [me]0-i feel safe]160-a tall and handsome young doctor who made me feel safe . “ What ’s [your]0-i name , [sweetheart]1301-sweetheart ? ”[160-a tall and handsome young doctor who made me feel safe] [he]160-a tall and handsome young doctor who made me feel safe asked as [he]160-a tall and handsome young doctor who made me feel safe examined [me]0-i . “ [Zoey]97-nora . ”[160-a tall and handsome young doctor who made me feel safe] “ Nice to meet [you]0-i , [Zoey]97-nora . ”[160-a tall and handsome young doctor who made me feel safe] [He]160-a tall and handsome young doctor who made me feel safe gave [me]0-i a friendly and warm smile . “ [I]160-a tall and handsome young doctor who made me feel safe ’m [Dr. John Benson]73-john . Do [you]0-i know [your]0-i last name ? ”[160-a tall and handsome young doctor who made me feel safe] “ [Anderson]74-anderson . ”[160-a tall and handsome young doctor who made me feel safe] “ [You]0-i ’re safe here and [we]1303-we ’re going to take good care of [you]0-i . [I]160-a tall and handsome young doctor who made me feel safe do n’t want [you]0-i to be afraid . ”[160-a tall and handsome young doctor who made me feel safe] “ [I]0-i ’m not afraid , ”[0-i] [I]0-i spoke in a soft voice as [I]0-i reached for [his]160-a tall and handsome young doctor who made me feel safe hand . In that moment , on that day , [my]0-i life was forever changed .

Chapter One

Chapter Two

[Carter]70-carter Shaking [my]0-i head , [I]0-i walked out of [Starbucks]14-starbucks and headed back to [the office]207-the office . “ [Immature idiots]1323-immature idiots , ”[0-i] [I]0-i mumbled to [myself]0-i . Chapter Nineteen

Chapter Thirty

[Carter]107-carter [She]971-her was leaving in the morning and [I]0-i was n’t happy about it . Chapter Forty

Zoey With [Carter]83-carter ’s help and connections , [we]1173-we started renovating [the twenty - thousand - square - foot mansion]1174-the twenty - thousand - square - foot mansion . About [the Author

Sandi Lynn]70-carter is a New York Times , USA Today and Wall Street Journal bestselling author who spends all [her]1293-her days writing . [She]1293-her published [her]1293-her first novel , Forever Black , in February 2013 and has n’t stopped writing since . [Her]1293-her addictions are shopping , going to [the gym]1294-the gym , romance novels , coffee , chocolate , margaritas , and giving [readers]1295-readers an escape to [another world]1296-another world .
